original_title: Union Station is different  — The Donald
article_summary: Union Station in DC is reportedly safer and cleaner, according to a woman, following President Trump's deployment of the National Guard. Some commenters suggest using forceful measures like pepper spray, water cannons, and even flamethrowers to address perceived issues with protesters. The discussion also touches on the perceived democrat-induced increase in crime and homelessness, and the conditioning of the public by propaganda.</s>
